slides.title: Trump's Trade Tariffs Hit India
slides.key_fact: In August 2025, Donald Trump imposed a 50% tariff on Indian goods, citing its continued purchases of Russian oil.
slides.visual_description: An extreme close-up, low-angle shot of a stern-faced Donald Trump, his eyes intensely focused downwards. Harsh, dramatic chiaroscuro lighting casts deep shadows, highlighting the tension in his expression. In the blurred foreground, a stack of red-stamped shipping containers suggests global trade disruption. The atmosphere is heavy and foreboding.

caption: 50% tariff on Indian goods?! That's a $100 billion hit in just one year. Trump's move in Aug 2025 wasn't just about trade, it was a direct response to India's Russian oil deals. This is HUGE for both economies. Swipe to see the full impact you might be missing...
